ppy/osu-wiki.summary: The osu! wiki repository has seen significant activity, with multiple pull requests focused on adding new tournament articles, updating existing game mode documentation, and retranslating content. One notable contribution includes the addition of an article for the ANZT6W tournament, while another aims to update and retranslate the 'Game mode' section. These changes are being tested against the contribution checklist and are awaiting review.

ppy/osu.summary: The osu! repository has experienced substantial activity, centered around enhancements to the osu!taiko game mode. Recent pull requests have introduced considerations for rhythm changes, rebalanced star ratings and performance points, and implemented stamina balancing. These updates are designed to improve the gameplay experience and provide a more nuanced difficulty assessment, with changes including increased multipliers for rhythm and stamina, as well as bonuses for consecutive notes.

ppy/SDL3-CS.summary: The SDL3-CS repository has seen activity with a recent pull request focused on updating bindings. This update incorporates pen support for both iOS and Android, leveraging changes from the SDL library, and removes an outdated file. The update is awaiting integration with the osu!framework, pending the release of a new package.
